Function Documentation

void EXTI_ClearEXTIFlag ( EXTI_LINE_ENUM  EXTILine  ) 

Clear External interrupt flag.

Parameters:
[in] EXTILine external interrupt line, should be:
  • EXTI_EINT0: external interrupt line 0
  • EXTI_EINT1: external interrupt line 1
  • EXTI_EINT2: external interrupt line 2
  • EXTI_EINT3: external interrupt line 3
Returns:
None

Configuration for EXT

void EXTI_SetMode ( EXTI_LINE_ENUM  EXTILine,
EXTI_MODE_ENUM  mode 
)

Set mode for EXTI pin.

Parameters:
[in] EXTILine external interrupt line, should be:
  • EXTI_EINT0: external interrupt line 0
  • EXTI_EINT1: external interrupt line 1
  • EXTI_EINT2: external interrupt line 2
  • EXTI_EINT3: external interrupt line 3
[in] mode external mode, should be:
  • EXTI_MODE_LEVEL_SENSITIVE
  • EXTI_MODE_EDGE_SENSITIVE
Returns:
None

void EXTI_SetPolarity ( EXTI_LINE_ENUM  EXTILine,
EXTI_POLARITY_ENUM  polarity 
)

Set polarity for EXTI pin.

Parameters:
[in] EXTILine external interrupt line, should be:
  • EXTI_EINT0: external interrupt line 0
  • EXTI_EINT1: external interrupt line 1
  • EXTI_EINT2: external interrupt line 2
  • EXTI_EINT3: external interrupt line 3
[in] polarity external polarity value, should be:
  • EXTI_POLARITY_LOW_ACTIVE_OR_FALLING_EDGE
  • EXTI_POLARITY_LOW_ACTIVE_OR_FALLING_EDGE
Returns:
None
